property.value: The tide of magic brought them here. Now it would take them home.

property.value: "I'll take that. You won't need it when the revolution comes."

property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the warrior who can admit mortal weakness will be bolstered by immortal strength.

property.value: Whenever Avenging Druid deals damage to an opponent, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. If you do, put that card onto the battlefield and put all other cards revealed this way into your graveyard.

property.value: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, you draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor

property.value: The il-Kor no longer roam the open plains, but they are still hunters.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player chooses from the permanents he or she controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a land, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Weatherlight dragged the Predator behind it, the cradle hauling the casket.

property.value: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hope shall be the blade that severs our bonds."

property.value: ć: Cinder Crawler gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if Cinder Crawler is blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crawler doesn't care what gets in its way. It pushes everything into the boiling muck and waits for the meal to cook.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "While we fought, the il surrendered."—Oracle en-Vec

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Hup, two, three, four,Dunno how to count no more."—Mogg march

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 10 or less life, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Selenia had hurt Mirri terribly, but injuries of the flesh could be treated. The wounds she had torn in Crovax's soul would never close.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Crashing Boars attacks, defending player chooses an untapped creature he or she controls. That creature blocks Crashing Boars this turn if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bores ruin a party. Boars are party to ruin.

property.value: "The blood of the weak shall be the ink with which we scribe great Yawgmoth's glorious name."—Stronghold architect, journal

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All Mirri wanted to do was rest, but she couldn't ignore a nagging suspicion as she followed Crovax's skulking form.

property.value: "Consider the fable of the greedy herder. As her flock grew, so did her weariness; she slept, and the sheep wandered off."—Karn, silver golem

property.value: For each blocking creature, flip a coin. If you win the flip, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mogglings caught in a misdeed often blame the grollub. Even though the creature is usually innocent, no taskmaster can resist an excuse to beat it.

property.value: As an additional cost to cast Hatred, pay X life. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will flay the skin from your flesh and the flesh from your bones and scrape your bones dry. And still you will not have suffered enough."—Greven il-Vec, to Gerrard

property.value: In war, as in society, position is everything.

If he or she does, that player puts that card onto the battlefield and all other cards revealed this way into his or her graveyard.

property.value: 1, Ċ: Transmogrifying Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay 1 to end this effect. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and is an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Treasure Hunter enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What separates junk from treasure is imagination."—Hanna, Weatherlight navigator

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Karn and Hanna stood over the recovered Legacy artifacts like loving parents over sleeping children.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard a creature card: Vampire Hounds gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The hounds' barks are a horrifying chorus of screams, moans, and whispers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 5 life: Destroy Volrath's Dungeon. Any player may activate this ability but only during his or her turn. Discard a card: Target player puts a card from his or her hand on top of his or her library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender (This creature can't attack.) At end of combat, exile all creatures blocked by Wall of Nets. When Wall of Nets leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with Wall of Nets to the battlefield under their owners' control.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Flying
ą: Put Wayward Soul on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "no home no heart no hope"—Stronghold graffito

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Welkin Hawk dies, you may search your library for a card named Welkin Hawk, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ą: Whiptongue Frog gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Secure in the embrace of wood, they want no part of Eladamri's war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Workhorse enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Workhorse: Add 1 to your mana pool.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if all nonland permanents you control are white, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Great chains shall free our warriors."—Oracle en-Vec
